description:
In this course you'll learn how to get the most out of Apple Music.

We'll help you get your Apple Music account set up, then you'll learn how to search for new music, set up playlists of your favorite tracks, listen to curated lists and even watch videos.

This is an introduction to Apple Music and is designed to get you started in an hour.

As you watch this course we encourage you to follow along on your iPhone or iPad and complete the steps as we go through them. Once you finish the course you'll have a solid understanding of how Apple Music works, and how to get the most out of it.
title: Apple Music - An Introduction
